mapper.sql: FUNC_ID, FUNC_NAME, FUNC_CODE, FUNC_API, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, STATUS_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(m.FUNC_ID) ,m.* FROM SYS_FUNCTION m LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION_FUNC_REL pmr ON pmr.FUNC_CODE = m.FUNC_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION p ON p.PERMISSION_CODE = pmr.PERMISSION_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE_PERMISSION_REF rpr ON rpr.PERMISSION_CODE = p.PERMISSION_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE r ON r.ROLE_CODE = rpr.ROLE_CODE left join SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF prr on prr.ROLE_CODE=r.ROLE_CODE left join SYS_USER_POSITION_REF upr on upr.POSITION_CODE=prr.POSITION_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_USER u ON u.USER_CODE = upr.USER_CODE WHERE m.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND pmr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND p.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND rpr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND r.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND prr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND upr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND u.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND u.ACCOUT = #{accout}

SELECT a.* , b.PRIV_FUNC_ID AS relId FROM SYS_FUNCTION a LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION_FUNC_REL b ON b.FUNC_CODE = a.FUNC_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION c ON c.permission_code = b.permission_code WHERE a.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND b.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND c.permission_id = #{permId}
